content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

**1. What is the Current Market Regime?**
CAUTION regime — low volatility at 13.1% but narrow participation with only 2/8 sectors positive, signaling concentration risk.

**2. Which sectors are leading?**
Banking & Finance ABOVE TREND: HALKB (1W: +7.83% | 1M: +24.85%) and VAKBN (1W: +5.46% | 1M: +14.10%) are driving the market; Energy & Chemicals ABOVE TREND: TRALT (1W: +22.29% | 1M: +22.23%) and TRMET (1W: +9.75% | 1M: +12.35%) showing strong directional flow.

**3. Which sectors are lagging?**
Technology & Telecom BELOW TREND: KONTR (1W: -8.87% | 1M: -63.43%) leads the downside, while Retail & Food is in CORRECTION with ULKER (1W: -4.17% | 1M: -2.88%) weakening.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

**4. Top Performing Stocks?**
TRALT (1W: +22.29% | 1M: +22.23%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +9.75% | 1M: +12.35%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +7.83% | 1M: +24.85%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: +5.92% | 1M: +20.38%) ABOVE TREND, VAKBN (1W: +5.46% | 1M: +14.10%) ABOVE TREND.

**5. Worst Performing Stocks?**
KONTR (1W: -8.87% | 1M: -63.43%) BELOW TREND, AEFES (1W: -6.87% | 1M: -1.02%) BELOW TREND, SASA (1W: -5.90% | 1M: -12.86%) BELOW TREND, OYAKC (1W: -5.89% | 1M: +6.28%) CORRECTION, KRDMD (1W: -5.50% | 1M: +7.03%) CORRECTION.

**6. Momentum Stocks?**
High momentum names: TRALT (1W: +22.29% | 1M: +22.23%) ABOVE TREND, TRMET (1W: +9.75% | 1M: +12.35%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +7.83% | 1M: +24.85%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: +5.92% | 1M: +20.38%) ABOVE TREND, KONTR (1W: -8.87% | 1M: -63.43%) BELOW TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

**7. Banking Sector Outlook?**
Banking & Finance remains the market engine and is ABOVE TREND: AKBNK (1W: +0.91% | 1M: +14.39%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +1.86% | 1M: +5.33%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +0.07% | 1M: +8.09%) ABOVE TREND, YKBNK (1W: +0.16% | 1M: +7.18%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +7.83% | 1M: +24.85%) ABOVE TREND, VAKBN (1W: +5.46% | 1M: +14.10%) ABOVE TREND.

**8. Industrial Sector Outlook?**
Heavy Industry is mixed and largely in CORRECTION: ASELS (1W: +5.92% | 1M: +20.38%) ABOVE TREND is the standout while EREGL (1W: -1.80% | 1M: +0.50%) CORRECTION, KRDMD (1W: -5.50% | 1M: +7.03%) CORRECTION, FROTO (1W: -3.03% | 1M: +6.85%) CORRECTION and TOASO (1W: -1.59% | 1M: +5.54%) CORRECTION show short-term weakness.

**9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?**
Energy & Chemicals shows dispersion: TRALT (1W: +22.29% | 1M: +22.23%) ABOVE TREND and TRMET (1W: +9.75% | 1M: +12.35%) ABOVE TREND lead, while TUPRS (1W: -0.80% | 1M: -5.03%) BELOW TREND and SASA (1W: -5.90% | 1M: -12.86%) BELOW TREND warn of sectoral divergence.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

**10. Portfolio Recommendation?**
In a CAUTION regime trim broad beta exposure and avoid index-wide buys; overweight selective leaders (TRALT, TRMET, HALKB, ASELS) and raise cash or hedge exposure in Technology & Retail where breadth is weakest.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

**11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?**
TRALT (1W: +22.29% | 1M: +22.23%) ABOVE TREND for continuation/parabolic risk, TRMET (1W: +9.75% | 1M: +12.35%) ABOVE TREND, HALKB (1W: +7.83% | 1M: +24.85%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: +5.92% | 1M: +20.38%) ABOVE TREND, KONTR (1W: -8.87% | 1M: -63.43%) BELOW TREND for downside follow-through.

**12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?**
Monitor Banking & Finance for leadership stability and Energy & Chemicals for concentration risk; watch Technology & Telecom for potential further breakdowns.

**13. Key Levels & Triggers?**
Watch XU100’s near-term support at the 20-day MA and recent swing lows and resistance at the monthly highs; key triggers are CBRT commentary, FX moves, oil prices and 4Q earnings surprises.

## EXECUTIVE SUMMARY

Low-volatility CAUTION regime with concentration in banking and select energy names; breadth is weak at 2/8 sectors positive so risk is asymmetric. Trade selectively: back winners on clear setups but underweight weak sectors (Tech, Retail) and keep liquidity for event-driven moves.
